element.name: SetCoordinateParam
element.short: Set longitude and latitude to their respective TParam.
element.descr: If both, longitude and latitude, are equal to zero, clear the TParam.

element.name: SetDateParam
element.short: Set a date value to a TParam.
element.descr: If date is equal to NullDate, clear the TParam.

element.name: SetFloatParam
element.short: Set a float value to a TParam.
element.descr: If the float value is equal to zero, clear the TParam.

element.name: SetForeignParam
element.short: Set a foreign key value to a TParam.
element.descr: If the foreign key is equal to zero, clear the TParam.

element.name: SetIntParam
element.short: Set an integer value to a TParam.
element.descr: If the integer value is equal to zero, clear the TParam.

element.name: SetStrParam
element.short: Set a string value to a TParam.
element.descr: If the string value is equal to EmptyStr, clear the TParam.

element.name: SetTimeParam
element.short: Set a time value to a TParam.
element.descr: If the time value is equal to NullTime, clear the TParam.
